imdb.title: Non Non Biyori
imdb.plot: Elementary school student Hotaru Ichijou has moved with her parents from Tokyo to the middle of the country. Now she must adapt to her new school, where there are a total of five students, who range through elementary and middle s...

episodes.title: I Played the Frog Song
episodes.plot: It's another idyllic day in the countryside, but things are anything but ordinary when Renge meets Akane, a flute player who has trouble playing in front of other people.

episodes.title: I Became a First Grader
episodes.plot: A few days before Hotaru transfers into Asahigaoka brunch school, Renge was looking forward to becoming a first grader.

episodes.title: We Went to Look at the Stars
episodes.plot: Hotaru doesn't adjust to the new environment yet, but she tries to enjoy it with her family and new friends. / Hotaru and Komari go to look at a starry sky, but their flashlight battery runs out just before they head back home.

episodes.title: We Got Motivated During the Holiday Break
episodes.plot: Natsumi got a bad score on her exam before they have a long weekend. The girls plan to study session at Renge's house during school holidays.

episodes.title: I Made a Teru Teru Bozu
episodes.plot: Although it has been rainy lately, Renge can't wait to ride a new bicycle. She comes up with a great idea while she is making a Teru Teru Bozu./ Renge mourns for some dead tadpole shrimps that she was eagerly looking after.

episodes.title: We Ate Okonomiyaki
episodes.plot: Komari has some water-related mishaps while the students are cleaning up the pool in school./ The girls take shelter from the rain into Kaede's candy store. Kaede treats them to lunch.

episodes.title: We Made Friends with Fireflies
episodes.plot: Natsumi doesn't come up with a topic to make a conversation with Hotaru while the two girls clean up school garden./ Hotaru invited the students with the intention of doing fireworks at night, but her plan isn't going well.

episodes.title: We Bravely Dove In
episodes.plot: Hotaru received a letter from her friend in Tokyo. Meanwhile, Hikage shows Renge her own photos that was taken in Tokyo Tower./ Hotaru tries to dive off the bridge into the river.

episodes.title: I Took Lunch Duty
episodes.plot: Natsumi and Renge can't think of any good idea to make something in woodworking class./ Natsumi recalls what happened when Hikage brought baby Renge in school./ Komari finds a broken teddy bear that she had cherished in her childhood.

episodes.title: We Looked at the Moon Together
episodes.plot: Natsumi goes fishing to a lake with her friends./ Natsumi and Hikage have unintentionally eaten all of dango that her mother prepared for the moon-viewing at that night.

episodes.title: I Practiced Really Hard
episodes.plot: Konomi pretends to be a yokai to tease Renge./ Renge decided to try riding her bicycle without training wheels under the supervision of Kaede.

episodes.title: I Became a Pampered Child
episodes.plot: Winter break started. Komari tries to send an email from the cellphone borrowed from Konomi./ Hikage tries to see the picture that Renge is drawing on New Year's cards./ Hotaru behaves like a spoiled child at home.

episodes.title: A Year Passed
episodes.plot: Spring has come. People enjoy cooking and eating some kinds of edible wild plants, especially bamboo shoots, that they had picked./ The girls prepare lunch for the cherry-blossom viewing.

episodes.title: OVA: Hotaru Had Fun
episodes.plot: On a Winter day, Hotaru has fun creating all kinds of things with the snow, which end up triggering a chain reaction of mishaps for Komari. During Spring, Hotaru goes to the candy store by herself and ends up making cookies with Kaede. On the last day of Summer, the girls use various senses to try and give Komari a pleasant dream. Finally, during the Autumn, the girls go to the woods to collect fruit, where Komari comes up against a flying squirrel.

episodes.title: A New Transfer Student Came
episodes.plot: Hotaru Ichijo is a fifth grader girl who transferred into Asahigaoka brunch school at the quiet countryside from Tokyo. She starts a new life with new friends.

episodes.title: We Went to a Candy Store
episodes.plot: Hotaru and Komari planned to hang out in their village. Hotaru dresses up and come to the appointed place, but Komari doesn't recognize her because she seems very mature for her age.

episodes.title: I Ran Away from Home with My Sister
episodes.plot: When Hotaru arrives at school, Natsumi tells her that a school picnic takes place today. Where will they go? / Natsumi was scolded by her mother. She leaves home with her sister Komari.

episodes.title: Summer Vacation Started
episodes.plot: Summer break started. Hotaru meets Hikage, Renge's another sister, for the first time. / Renge meets a girl who makes a short stay at her village.

episodes.title: I Pretended I Forgot My Swimsuit
episodes.plot: The students go swimming to the sea. Hotaru finds that only Komari aren't enjoying the day.

episodes.title: I Became a Ghost and Tried Hard
episodes.plot: Hotaru has made a lot of stuffed toys in the motif of Komari. This is her small secret. But then, Natsumi, Komari and Renge come to her home suddenly. / Natsumi decided that test of courage takes place at a night shrine.

episodes.title: My Rice Cracker Turned Into Curry
episodes.plot: It's time to go back to school. Hotaru and Renge are closed in a hutch for rabbits accidentally. / Renge spends a time with Kaede at her candy store.

episodes.title: We Cooked Rice at School
episodes.plot: Girls enjoy various things in fall. / The students prepare lunch themselves with vegetables that they have grown.

episodes.title: We Tried Having a Cultural Festival
episodes.plot: The annual festival will be held at Asahigaoka brunch school for the first time by Natsumi's suggestion.

episodes.title: We Watched the First Sunrise of the Year
episodes.plot: It's New Year's Eve today. Miyauchi sisters and Kaede go to top of the mountain to see the sunrise on New Year's Day after dinner.

episodes.title: We Made Snow Houses
episodes.plot: The students and teacher Miyauchi had to stay for the night in school due to a snowstorm. Next morning, they make a Japanese igloo under a clear sky.

episodes.title: Spring Came Again
episodes.plot: Spring came again. Hotaru and Komari enjoy a picnic./ People work for the public, like cleaning and pruning, while the students pick edible wild plants in mountain.

episodes.title: OVA: We're Going to Okinawa
episodes.plot: Suguru wins some tickets to Okinawa in a shopping mall lottery, so the whole gang plan to go on a trip there. To prepare for the trip, the girls practice being on an airplane and go to a convenience store to buy some travel things. Meanwhile, Renge is very thoughtful about how the trip may change her view on the world, spending the evening before the trip giving her farewells to the countryside. The next day, everyone sets off on their flight to Okinawa.
